title: Blue Apron shares jump
text:
Blue Apron shares jump 1:59pm EST - 01:01 
Blue Apron shares jumped after the meal-kit maker reported a smaller-than-expected drop in sales and a tick up in average revenue per customer in the fourth quarter. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Blue Apron shares jumped after the meal-kit maker reported a smaller-than-expected drop in sales and a tick up in average revenue per customer in the fourth quarter. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
